snippet.title: Arsene Lupin: Gentleman Bomber - Piepacker Studios
snippet.description:
Back in 1905 one of the most prolific, daring and dazzling thief was starting his career. He is none other than Arsène Lupin, the gentleman thief.
This is his untold story, a story of bold action, disguise and thievery.
Embody 8 of the most iconic characters of the series, and if you're lucky, you'll discover some hidden gems.
Take your character through 6 different maps representing both defining moments of  Arsène’s story and cultural French beacons. Each level has its own strong audio theme.
Choose among 5 different game modes, each with their own set of objectives and gimmicks representing Arsène’s different skills and sides, from gentleman to thief.
In any case, be sure to bomb your opponents before they bomb you!

Arsène Lupin: Gentleman Bomber is available in Early Access through our Kickstarter campaign: https://pp.fun/kickstarter​

Join our community!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/piepacker​
Twitter: https://twitter.com/piepacker​
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/piepackerofficial
Discord: https://discord.gg/piepacker
